title: How I did Part 1 of this Assignment
content: In order to create a light/dark toggle button, I made an alternative class to define my dark mode. I then created a script file to change the class for each section

title: How I did Part 2 of this Assignment
content: I made the html file just as an initializer for the blog page. In this JSON file, I made an array of objects containing the title, date and content. In my js file, I iterate through each object to parse into js variables to be printed out.
